about_the_game:
WHAT THE FOX IS THIS PLACE?


New to a bizarre, but familiar world, you take control of a fox with a magic wand who wants answers. For starters, you’ve no idea how you got here, let alone why the reality of this place feels so scattered and warped. And who put this wand in your paw anyway?

DECYPHER THE WONDERWAND

To unravel this puzzling situation, you’ll have to overcome all sorts of wacky puzzles, unexpected encounters and curious challenges. Unlocking all of the wondrous abilities of your wand & discovering how they can manipulate the world around you seems to be your only ticket out of this jam.

HARNESS MAGICAL ABILITIES

  • On your quest for discovery you’ll learn to:
  • Instantly swap places with almost anything you zap
  • Send frozen monsters sliding helplessly away with your ice beam
  • Redirect deadly ricocheting lasers to find a safe passage forwards
  • Set destructible environments and slimes on fire with chaotic chain-reaction physics
  • And finds new ways to cause more spellbinding havoc!
  • Keep your wits about you and just maybe you’ll find some much-needed answers!

CREATE & SHARE DIY DUNGEONS

Wonderwand also has a level editor tool that lets you conjure up perilous dungeons and challenge others to magic their way out of them, or die trying! Utilise a growing toolkit of props & enemies to create a near-unlimited variety of unique levels.

You can even design with speedrunning in mind! A giant disembodied hand could be set loose to grab anyone who moves too slow, or doesn’t evade it well enough!

BECOME THE SLYEST FOX


Speedrunning is also a built-in mode in Wonderwand! Race against the clock as you utilise every spell in your wizarding arsenal to manoeuvre quickly through puzzling situations, beat previous bests, and earn your spot on the wonder boards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a spellbinding adventure in a strange land that’s brimming with puzzling dungeons, bouncing slimes & zany encounters in WONDER WAND, a 2D puzzle game about a confused fox with a magical wand.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
